name: code-challenge
description: Note that if you fork this repository, your responses may be publicly linked to this repo.   Please submit your application along with the solutions attached or linked.

scripts.problem5:migrate: npm run problem5:build && npx sequelize-cli-typescript db:migrate
scripts.problem5:migrate:undo:all: npm run problem5:build && npx sequelize-cli-typescript db:migrate:undo:all
scripts.problem5:test: npm run problem5:migrate && mocha src/problem5/**/*.spec.ts && npm run problem5:migrate:undo:all
scripts.problem5:clean:test:run: npm run problem5:clean && npm run problem5:test && npm run problem5:run
